alert.note: Alert for Otero Mesa; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 25 at 11:59PM MST until December 26 at 6:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The southern Otero county lowlands and mesas as well as much of Hudspeth county out of the Rio Grande valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 6 PM MST Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong west/southwesterly winds could blow around unsecured objects and holiday decorations. Tree limbs could be blown down. Local blowing dust and buffeting winds may make travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Otero Mesa; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
